definition: Mo Yan (1955-), Chinese novelist, winner of 2012 Nobel Prize in Literature
do not/there is none who
surname Mo
words/speech/to say/to talk

sentences.english: This is Mo Yan who has gotten the Nobel prise and he was the author we are pride of.
sentences.chinese: 這是莫言已經諾貝爾獎賞和作者他是我們的驕傲。

sentences.english: The reason lies in the black holes in Mo Yan's mind and soul.
sentences.chinese: 其根源在於莫言心理和靈魂的黑洞。

sentences.english: A prolific author, Mo has published dozens of short stories, with his first work published in 1981.
sentences.chinese: 莫言發表了多部小說，第一部作品發表於1981年。
